medical_history.chief_complaint: Chronic back pain deteriorating over several months.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient's symptoms began in 2010, with chronic back pain that worsened over several months, leading to MRI scans revealing multiple tumors.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Metastatic infiltration of the bone by a well-differentiated neuroendocrine tumor was diagnosed; no relevant past medical conditions were mentioned.
medical_history.family_history: The patient's brother is aware of the genotyping result but has no remarkable medical history. Parents are alive with no specified relevant family history.
